scripts.dev:backend: concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:trading" "npm run dev:wallet"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: npm run build:auth && npm run build:trading && npm run build:wallet
scripts.build:frontend: npm run build:web && npm run build:admin
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: npm run test:auth && npm run test:trading && npm run test:wallet
scripts.test:frontend: npm run test:web && npm run test:admin
scripts.migrate: npm run migrate:postgres && npm run migrate:mongo
scripts.seed: npm run seed:postgres && npm run seed:mongo
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:mobile
scripts.install:backend: cd backend/auth-service && npm install && cd ../trading-engine && npm install && cd ../wallet-service && npm install && cd ../kyc-service && npm install && cd ../notification-service && npm install && cd ../analytics-service && npm install && cd ../admin-service && npm install && cd ../blockchain-service && npm install && cd ../p2p-service && npm install && cd ../copy-trading-service && npm install
scripts.install:frontend: cd frontend/web-app && npm install && cd ../admin-dashboard && npm install && cd ../landing-pages && npm install
scripts.install:mobile: cd mobile/android && ./gradlew build && cd ../ios && pod install
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && npm run docker:build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.staging.yml up -d
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && npm run docker:build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.production.yml up -d
